Play game activity strings <--> Play Again Main Menu Pause Resume Score
Score screen activity strings <--> Scores Please log in to save scores.
Instructions activity strings <--> Instructions 1) A random block will appear in the center and start dropping. 2) The direction the block drops will switch every turn. 3) Swipe left and right to move the block. 4) Tap on the falling block to rotate it. 5) Long press to increase the falling speed and release to return it to normal. 6) Double tap to drop the block instantly. 7) Fill in a row to score points. 8) If a block reaches the center rows, the game ends.
